name: #TeamTrees
description:
This is a very early prototype of a game I made to plant trees. TeamTrees is trying to plant 20 million trees before 2020 and I thought I'd make a game regarding this event.

All you are able to do now is plant trees but in the future you will be  able to do more. 

Let me know if there is anything you would like to be added in the comments, donations are always welcome to help me develop this game, but MOST IMPORTANTLY don't forget to donate to #TeamTrees to SAVE THE WORLD!!!

DONATE HERE

The  goal is to release a full build for the game before 2020
